com.microsoft.azure.management.dns

Interface ZoneOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZoneOperationsImpl

    public interface ZoneOperations
    Operations for managing DNS zones.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ZoneCreateOrUpdateResponse createOrUpdate(String resourceGroupName, String zoneName, ZoneCreateOrUpdateParameters parameters)

    • Method Detail

      • createOrUpdate

        ZoneCreateOrUpdateResponse createOrUpdate(String resourceGroupName,
                                          String zoneName,
                                          ZoneCreateOrUpdateParameters parameters)
                                   throws IOException,
                                          ServiceException
        Creates a DNS zone within a resource group.
        Parameters:
        resourceGroupName - Required. The name of the resource group.
        zoneName - Required. The name of the zone without a terminating dot.
        parameters - Required. Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.
        Returns:
        The response to a Zone CreateOrUpdate operation.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.

      • delete

        OperationResponse delete(String resourceGroupName,
                         String zoneName,
                         ZoneDeleteParameters parameters)
                  throws IOException,
                         ServiceException
        Removes a DNS zone from a resource group.
        Parameters:
        resourceGroupName - Required. The name of the resource group.
        zoneName - Required. The name of the zone without a terminating dot.
        parameters - Required. The parameters supplied to delete a zone
        Returns:
        A standard service response including an HTTP status code and request ID.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.

      • list

        ZoneListResponse list(String resourceGroupName,
                      ZoneListParameters parameters)
               throws IOException,
                      ServiceException
        Lists the DNS zones within a resource group.
        Parameters:
        resourceGroupName - Required. The name of the resource group.
        parameters - Optional. Query parameters. If null is passed returns the default number of zones.
        Returns:
        The response to a Zone List or ListAll operation.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.

                                   ZoneListParameters parameters)

        parameters - Optional. Query parameters. If null is passed returns the default number of zones.
        Returns:

      • listNext

        ZoneListResponse listNext(String nextLink)
                   throws IOException,
                          ServiceException
        Lists the DNS zones within a resource group.
        Parameters:
        nextLink - Required. NextLink from the previous successful call to List operation.
        Returns:
        The response to a Zone List or ListAll operation.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
